title: 地皮权限问题
txt_content:
我输入了mangaddp builder plotme.use
mangaddp builder plotme.tp
mangaddp builder plotme.add
mangaddp builder plotme.remove
可他们只能领取地皮，add什么的用不了

replies.author: 一错再错丨
replies.txt_content: 试着输入mangaddp builder plotme.use.add应该可以吧

replies.author: WT2075853462
replies.txt_content: 一脸懵逼进来一看 已经解决了？
